Description: CorFigo is a medical device company that develops a cryo-ablation device for the treatment of cardiac arrythmias.
Full Description: CorFigo is a medical device company that develops a cryo-ablation device for the treatment of cardiac arrythmias.  The company's device is delivered and positioned adjacent to the heart for minimally invasive ablation procedures and is intended to ablate generally large contiguous areas of cardiac tissue, such as atrial and ventricular tissue, with each individual application, enabling physicians to fix hearts that are not working properly, using creativity and technology. The HeartPad is a device intended for the ablation of cardiac tissue from an epicardial (outer surface of the heart) location, while simultaneously protecting adjacent structures from unintentional ablation injury. Designed for minimally invasive ablation, our proprietary technology utilizes potent cryothermal energy coupled with a sophisticated delivery system. The intended result of the HeartPad system’s unique and innovative design is the efficient and safe ablation of broad areas of cardiac tissue. CorFigo was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Montclair, New Jersey, United States.

Description: Sports Performance Tracking is a developer of in-game contacts sports wearable GPS and sports science software.
Full Description: In 2015, Sports Performance Tracking launched GameTraka™ and was formed to fill a gap in the market for sporting players all over the globe. If you’re a professional athlete you have all these great tools and coaching staff to track your activity, monitor your output and improve your game. Unfortunately nothing like that exists at the amateur level. You will hear professional coaches talk about how hard a player worked, how fast he is and even how much of an endurance athlete he is. It’s really weird to think that in 2015 this sort of data has existed at an elite level for over a decade now but the technology hasn’t filtered down to the amateur sporting arena. After a couple of years of trial and error and tech development, Sports Performance Tracking launched GameTraka™ in January 2015 at Las Vegas CES show. GameTraka™ is a web-based sports performance tracking platform and has been designed and developed with sub-elite athletes and amateur players in mind. The ability for technology to filter down to grass roots sporting level and allow YOU to track, measure and monitor your physical performance based on facts. SPT has worked extremely hard at establishing itself as a leader in the local sporting community and strives for greatness in this area. We are currently selling our GPS platform across multiple sports and have customers in 19 countries (United States, Australia, South Africa, Switzerland, Sweden, Norway, Netherlands, Kenya, Japan, Italy, Ireland, United Kingdom, France, Canada, Brazil, Belgium, Qatar, India and Algeria) across all 7 continents. They are playing Soccer, Aussie Rules Football, Rugby, Netball, Hockey and Ultimate Frisbee with scope to develop much further. SPT strives to be the leader in wearable sporting technology and analytics at the sub-elite level.
Industry Groups: Commerce and Shopping, Sports

Description: Helping large BCOs move inventory faster via low-cost end-to-end supply chain visibility and predictive analytics
Full Description: ODYN is the only platform that gives large CPG co's full, cross-stakeholder supply chain visibility, by using an end-to-end, proprietary pallet tracking device and prescriptive software. This unique visibility gives CPG co's the shipping info they need in order to most efficiently reduce inventory on their books ("days of inventory," an accounting term of art), which translates to considerable supply chain savings. Days of inventory example: a $10B revenue company's inventory day equals $27m, therefore a reduction of lead time from 55 to 50 days represents $135m in cash flow and ($5.5m in operating cost savings, since inventory carrying cost represents roughly 20% of operating cost -- for handling, risk, etc.).

Description: Galactic Bioware, Inc. is a team of designers and engineers working to increase the survivability of dangerous and extreme environments
Full Description: Galactic Bioware, Inc. is a team of designers and engineers that are working to increase the survivability of dangerous and extreme environments. Dangers come in many forms both man-made and environmental, including crime, terrorism, natural disasters and accidents, as well as the dangers involved in space travel and settlements. We are in the business of designing and manufacturing advanced human survival gear and elite performance equipment. Our gear enables people to survive and thrive in Earth's most dangerous environments and situations. Galactic Bioware's research and development on Earth will enable us not only to be a leader in the emerging power suit market on Earth, but to be a first-mover and leader in off-planet protective equipment in the coming years as the human ambition for long duration space exploration and settlements becomes a reality. Our research into wearable thermal insulation, ballistics and shrapnel resistance, radiation shielding, high-speed impact safety, breathing and comfort apparatus will put us at the forefront of human life in space and on less-hospitable planets.
Industry Groups: Consumer Electronics, Hardware, Manufacturing, Software

Description: BrainWatch is a medical device company that has developed an automatic monitoring system of the pupillary light reflex through closed eyes.
Full Description: BrainWatch Tech is developing a real-time, continuous, automatic pupil reflex monitoring system for assessing the neurological status of unconscious patients in cases of traumatic brain injury, stroke, and brain surgery. The technology behind BrainWatch is an automatic monitoring system of the pupillary light reflex through closed eyes, using an optical system for image acquisition and AI for image and data analysis. BrainWatch's solution continuously monitors pupillary activity in unconscious patients through closed eyes, immediately alerting surgeons and staff to changes in the patient's condition. The system also enables pupil monitoring in real time during complex brain surgery. The product will look like a pair of virtual reality goggles, equipped with a camera lens and a light that will continuously monitor, measure, and record pupil size and reflex through the closed eyelids of patients with severe brain injury. The continuous monitoring will create a record of the patient's condition and response to treatment over time. BrainWatch Tech was established in the eHealth Ventures incubator, which fosters early-stage digital health start-ups.
Headquarters Regions: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA), Middle East
Industry Groups: Health Care

Full Description: Venari Medical’s mission focus is on the innovation of unparalleled safe, effective, patient-centered medical devices that improve quality of life for those with debilitating vascular disease. Venari Medical are developing BioVena™ - a more effective, less invasive, and faster treatment for all venous disease patients. It is uniquely positioned to disrupt current treatment practices which have seen only medium level innovation in the past decade. The team is based at Ireland's medtech cluster in Galway. Only 1.3 million of the 120 million people in the US & EU who suffer from venous disease currently receive endovenous treatment each year. 3 million venous ulcer patients are completely unserved, using ineffective compression bandaging. Venari Medical offers an unrivaled lower risk and unparalleled effective non-thermal treatment which will allow more patients who suffer from Venous Disease to access effective treatment. The indication for the use of superficial venous ablation is also set to widen to treat venous ulcers that currently incur annual costs of $33Bn to insurers in the US & EU. The Venari Medical technology can be used as a safe and effective treatment for the whole spectrum of Venous Disease from varicose veins to active venous ulcers.

Description: Barkmall is an e-commerce marketplace for consumers and sellers focused on everything pets, from pet products to pet services.
Full Description: Barkmall is an e-commerce marketplace startup for consumers and sellers which is focused on pet-related products, including pet food, pet accessories, and care services. It facilitates transactions between consumers and a wide range of sellers such as retailers, wholesalers, veterinary clinics, and other professional sellers or care providers.  Operating in Asia, Barkmall is first launched in Hong Kong and endeavours to expand its reach to China, Singapore, Thailand, and APAC region.  At Barkmall, we view pets (and pet parents) as family, and we are obsessed with meeting and exceeding their needs through every interaction. Pet parents want a trusted destination where they can purchase a wide selection of goods or services with ease and at the most competitive prices. We reimagined the pet commerce experience with the goal of meeting and exceeding pet parents and pet sellers every need and desire, with our commitment to customer service, which is at the core of our offering. Barkmall is powered by a dynamic end-to-end e-commerce, logistics and technology backbone and a culture of exceeding customers’ needs. Our technology transforms the way pet commerce work from providing personalised shopping experience, last-mile delivery to reimagining how pet parents search and discover on a truly pet-centric platform. All of this enables us to break those conventional customer trade-offs, and give our customers more choice, faster service, and lower costs. Barkmall.com is the only online shopping mall that is 100% dedicated to everything pets. It offers Bark First which is an annual membership program with free shipping and other perks, and autoship service which is a subscription based recurring orders. For sellers, Barkmall offers the fulfilled-by-bark services which is a full service logistics solution for pet sellers.  Barkmall’s mission: We strive to offer pet parents the most competitive prices, the best selection of products, and the most convenient shopping experience with excellent customer care. Barkmall’s vision: Barkmall’s vision is to be the most trusted pet-centric company, where pet parents can find and discover any product or service they want or need online. Barkmall was founded in 2020 and is headquartered in Hong Kong.

Our first project Quokka app reached more than 20.000 users in less than a year. It was a location - based social network, iOS and Android platform, which enabled users to be protagonists of their local ecosystems through their contents. Quokka's revenue model was a location based adv. Quokka has become famous in Rome since the launch of the digital fight between "Roma Nord" and "Roma Sud" on July '16. It was a location based social experiment that engaged thousands of Romans to share more than 6k pictures per week on the platform. We closed our service on December 2016. Our team decided it was time to pivot to new things in the b2c market.  On February 2017 we launched our app "Razmataz - the fastest way to share your location with your friends". Razmataz reaches thousands of teenagers and got a satisfactory initial traction, but not enough to allows the company to go in revenue and find the product/market fit. Description: Microwave assisted thermal sterilization, or MATS, natural food processing and packaging systems.
Full Description: Microwave Assisted Thermal Sterilization, or MATS™, is a breakthrough food technology that improves the quality and nutritional value of shelf-stable foods. Processing and packaging foods with the MATS system preserves the color, taste and texture of food — while eliminating the need for excess sodium, additives and enhancers. MATS technology enables food manufacturers to deliver a wide variety of high quality, nutritious and clean-label packaged foods with mass-market distribution, pricing and convenience. 915 Labs offers several systems for sale or lease, all of which are capable of both sterilizationa nd pasteurization. The MATS-B 100 is a pilot-scale system that processes up to 100 units per hour for recipe and product development, sample runs, testing and research and development. The MATS-30 is a commercial-scale production system that processes up to 30 units per minute for regional food processing. Larger capacity production systems with a throughput between 50 and 225 units per minute are available by custom design. Wraparound services are available to support customers and accelerate the application of MATS, including product and recipe development, thermal process validation, and state-of-the-art packaging solutions.

Description: Reflection Sciences provides professional development, assessment tools, intervention guidelines, and data analytics.
Full Description: Reflection Sciences provides training and tools for assessing executive function skills in early childhood and across the lifespan. Executive function (EF) refers to neurocognitive skills, such as attention, working memory, self-control, and cognitive flexibility, that are involved in goal-directed problem solving. These are essential life skills that provide a foundation for learning and adaptation in a wide range of contexts. EF skills make it possible for children to learn effectively and efficiently in a classroom context, and they protect children against risks associated with adversity. EF measured in childhood has been proven to predict school readiness, academic achievement, and educational attainment, as well as career success, health, wealth, and well-being in adulthood.

Description: Paycore Minerals is a junior exploration company that holds a 100% interest of the FAD Project located on the Eureka-Battle-Mountain.
Full Description: Paycore Minerals is a junior exploration company that holds a 100% interest of the FAD Project located on the Eureka-Battle-Mountain. The  FAD Project is a high-grade poly-metallic (gold, silver, lead and zinc) project with historical production from the 1940’s and 1950’s. FAD is a carbonate replacement deposit (“CRD”) containing  a historical non-NI 43-101 resource of approximately 3,903,000 Tons grading 5.14 g/t Au, 196.46 g/t Ag, 7.99% Zn and 3.80% Pb.  which was outlined in the 1974 Feasibility Study completed by Hecla Mining.  The FAD deposit can be accessed via the FAD shaft which was intermittently mined from 1956 to 1958. Paycore Minerals is focused on multiple near-term value enhancing strategies including; drilling to confirm the historic mineralization as defined by the 1976 feasibility study.
Industry Groups: Natural Resources

Description: Milk and Eggs Connects health conscious customers with local farms & artisan food makers.
Full Description: Farms & more!  We are an online food market connecting people to amazing farmers and food makers. Delivery is FREE. Our customers can order once or sign up for subscriptions of milk, eggs, dairy, meats, vegetables, and fruits on a weekly or bi-weekly basis. All food will be fresh and locally acquired.    All our products are sourced from local growers or aggregators. If not available due to seasonality, they will still be procured through a local aggregator. Our short logistics cycle enables vine and tree ripened foods to be brought from the farm to your door within 48 hours.  The goal is to have the shortest distance between you and your food so you can eat it the way nature intended. Get it fresh, get it local, taste the difference. The truly hyper-local sources along with our expansion into a food marketplace is what sets us apart from competitors.  We bring local bakeries with their fresh breads and bagels right to your door.  We also offer fresh pastas and pasta sauces along with fresh juices and hand carved meats from local butchers straight to you.  It saves you time and allows you to enjoy the quality and freshness of these locally famous businesses from the convenience of your home.  Deliveries are dropped off at your front door and can be retrieved whenever convenient. Our delivery system allows for minimal carbon footprint, much less than customers going to the grocery store themselves. One emissary (driver) can deliver many orders in 1 efficient trip, saving on both emissions and the environment; not to mention saving you time.  We’re here to help and make your life better with high quality foods, at prices 50% off, delivered to your door.

Industries: Blockchain, Contact Management, Document Management, E-Signature, FinTech, SaaS
Description: Legally secured contracts on the Blockchain
Full Description: Mifiel is the most trusted e-signature SaaS solution in Mexico. The platform has been entrusted to secure legal documents of hundreds of organizations including multinational banks and Fortune 500 companies. The advanced e-signatures* generated by Mifiel are presumed to be authentic in court unless the signer can prove otherwise, giving it advantage over any other e-signature standard or even autograph signatures. As such, Mifiel provides a more legally robust alternative to widely used e-signature platforms that are better suited to the legal systems in the U.S. and the U.K. Mifiel is also the first platform in the world to enable the secure electronic transfer of endorsable documents (e.g. negotiable instruments such as promissory notes, titles, etc.) by leveraging blockchain technology. *An advanced e-signature is akin to a digital identification card issued by the government, often associated to the biometric data of the individual to which it belongs. It is composed of a cryptographic key pair (provided as files or as files embedded within a chip in an ID card) that allows the individual to securely authenticate their identity and sign documents digitally. There are over 60 countries in the world that emit such signatures, most notably in Mexico, the EU, and East Asia.
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, Information Technology, Other, Privacy and Security, Software
Founders: Genaro Madrid, Hannah Kim, Rodrigo González del Cueto, Sergio Díaz Nila, Tomas Alvarez
Top 5 Investors: Digital Currency Group, Tim Draper, KF Ventures, Alejandro Ozerkovsky

Turnover has been growing and we have attained break even.  We're seeing early traction and are generating excellent customer feedback. Drainage, electrical and plumbing contractors are connecting to each other in order to work more effectively and be able to compete head on with the big boys in their respective industries. Description: Oyalabs is an evidence-based platform for new parents that allows them to monitor and improve their child's development.
Full Description: Our mission is to translate ground-breaking science into innovative products that empower families to raise lifelong learners. Founded by a Stanford neuroscientist and a father of 2 young boys, our first product is Wunder, which is the first personalized, science-based platform to help new parents lead their little ones learning journey through play, imagination, and collaborative curiosity.  The first idea for Oyalabs came about when our founder's first son was born with a congenital medical condition and he was looking for a science-based resource for parents to ensure they are stimulating not just physical but also cognitive development of their child - knowing 0-3 is the most critical period for intervention as 90% of the brain grows then.  After positive results from a clinical study, in Summer 2017, we created Wunder to help harness predictive technologies to build tools to nurture not only Lamont’s own sons, as well as something meaningful and impactful for all families. Our technology has been shown to improve a child's language and cognitive outcomes in a research trial and has won the Best of BabyTech Learn & Play award at CES 2018.   Based on the data and interactive curriculum in the Wunder app, the platform recommends parents age-appropriate activities, books and toys to teach and motivate parents to provide the most stimulating learning experience for their everyday bonding.  Wunder is currently in Beta and parents with children between 0-24 months can apply to get access here: www.hellowunder.com/beta
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Education, Hardware, Information Technology, Other, Software

Industries: Biotechnology, Electronics, Health Care, Manufacturing, Medical
Description: implantable system, micro-machining electrode manufacturing, cochlear implant, neuromodulation
Full Description: TODOC is the technology leader of neural prosthesis and neuromodulation system in Korea. TODOC is developing cochlear implant system with innovative manufacturing method for implantable neural interface. People who have a hearing loss greater than 90dB are guided to use cochlear implant instead of hearing aids to restore hearing. Our goal is to expand the cochlear implant market globally. Because of the high price, cochlear implants are usually consumed in the developed countries such as North America and Europe. However, majority of the hearing-impaired population currently resides in the developing or underdeveloped countries where people cannot afford the benefit of the cochlear implant. This high price of the cochlear implant is mostly due to the manual method of manufacturing the neural electrodes. To replace the conventional manual fabrication method, TODOC has developed automated micro-machining electrode manufacturing processes at only 1/10 of conventional manufacturing cost of electrode, as well as the cochlear implant system. The automated electrode manufacturing processes can offer higher capacities for a wider range of sounds to the hearing impaired than conventional ones. TODOC aims to become a global leader in the Brain-Machine Interface field based on its superior Neural Interface Technology.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Consumer Electronics, Hardware, Health Care, Manufacturing, Science and Engineering

Description: Ice Shot is a food & beverages company that makes & sells alcoholic ice creams & also offers special non-alcoholic ice creams.
Full Description: They make and sell alcoholic ice creams, but they also offer special non-alcoholic ice creams. They can make your own unique alcoholic ice cream from high quality mainstream or exclusive drinks or even your own bottled beverage. The freezing point of non-freezing or hard-to-drink alcohols is increased by a naturally occurring additive that is made exclusively for their company. This process does not produce sorbet ice cream, an ice cream-like alcoholic flavored product, but a real alcoholic ice cream that does not lose its creamy texture and captures the distinctive flavor of alcohol. Different amounts of alcohol are used for different flavors. It can take up to liters of a lower alcohol drink, while a fraction of it is burned with alcohol. Therefore, the alcohol content of ice cream ranges from about 9% to 10%. Therefore, they do not recommend driving a car after eating a dumpling! But they always offer non-alcoholic ice cream for their drivers and kids. The following list of forties is constantly expanding to include the classic cocktails or the ice cream version of famous beers and wines, the fruits of Laci and Dani's collaboration - ice creams that are not found anywhere else, either in their cocktail or drink! Description: MAIA is dedicated to developing targeted cancer therapies
Full Description: MAIA Biotechnology is dedicated to developing targeted cancer therapies with novel mechanisms of action that are intended to meaningfully improve and extend the lives of patients with cancer.  ​ Telomerase is present in 90% of human cancer cells and contributes significantly to proliferative abilities and immortality of cancer cells. It is either absent or shows low activity in normal cells. THIO(6-thio-dG) is recognized by telomerase and incorporated into telomeres. Once incorporated, it compromises telomere structure and function, leading to ‘uncapping’ of the chromosome ends resulting in rapid tumor cell death.

Description: BOW Group is a global player in lifestyle products and accessories
Full Description: BOW Group is a global player and multi-skilled platform with design, development, manufacturing, and distribution capabilities, which offers solutions answering the needs of our modern lifestyles. With its 4 offices around the world - Paris, Geneva, Miami and Shenzhen - BOW Group aims to become a world leader in lifestyle products and accessories in all their forms; with its two consumers brand Lexon and MyKronoz, its two retail concepts that are Musart and Legacy, as well as BOW Industries, its R&D center that owns 70 design patents.   BOW Group has secured three phases of financing: The French private equity company NextStage invested a total of € 10.5 million. PMI through its corporate venture PMEP participated in the series B funding to support the Group's expansion plan. MyKronoz raised $8M through crowdfunding campaigns, making us the most funded European company in Kickstarter history.   These investments have allowed us to conduct three acquisitions: ⁃              The vertical integration of BOW Industries, our long-term ODM partner in Shenzhen, China, to ensure full industrial and R&D autonomy. ⁃              LEXON, a French company and publisher of objects for 30 years, with more than 200 design awards and access to a network of nearly 100 international designers to diversify our range beyond affordable IoT. ⁃              MUSART, an American art marketplace that strengthens our digital footprint and allows us to continue diversifying our product portfolio by democratizing art to a large audience.   Learn more about our brands:   LEXON / DESIGN OBJECTS Over the last three decades, Lexon has been committed to bringing to consumers simple and affordable design objects that are here to last, ones that are meant to be part of our daily life, from morning till night. With more than 200 awards, collaboration with some of the world’s leading designers, a retail presence in more than 90 countries, Lexon has successfully established itself as an iconic French design brand. lexon-design.com   MYKRONOZ / CONNECTED OBJECTS MyKronoz focuses on consumer IoT since its foundation in 2013, with a wide portfolio spanning from wearables to smart products for the home, having sold 3M of connected devices with its own cloud architecture and proprietary mobile app. Awarded with 2 Red Dot Design Awards and 2 iF Design Awards over the past two years. www.mykronoz.com   MUSART / ART OBJECTS Musart is a fast-growing art marketplace to buy original artworks and licensed products. Since its inception in 2014, the mission of this online destination is to make art accessible, giving anyone the opportunity to own a piece of museum. musart.com   LEGACY / LUXURY OBJECTS Legacy is an exclusive hybrid concept store boasting a sharply curated selection of products comprising multiple categories such as watches, jewelry, art, tech, books, eyewear, beauty and more.

Industries: Database, Hospitality, Hotel, Personalization, SaaS, Travel
Description: HDC is a b2b content distribution platform that lets hotels control how they are portrayed on booking channels
Full Description: Hotels rely on complex distribution networks with hundreds of booking channels to sell their rooms. These channels require detailed descriptive content about the hotels, highlighting their features, amenities, services, and facilities. Distressingly, the content currently available is incomplete and even inaccurate, misleading, and obsolete. Hotel Data Cloud (HDC) is a content distribution platform that enables hotels to easily share detailed content and comprehensive information in a standardized, globally consistent format. HDC captures over 600 attributes per property, multilingual descriptions, images with corresponding metadata and also temporary changes, such us undergoing renovations. This reduces manual workload and lets hotels efficiently control the narrative of their listing across all booking channels, improving their discoverability and leading to increased bookings and revenue. Artificial intelligence and machine learning are applied to generate personalized content and smart recommendations. Travel companies can access this content through HDC's data feed, allowing them to provide detailed, consistent and reliable information to their customers. All connected channels are immediately updated, which eliminates the need for hotels to perform redundant manual updates of various extranets. With an unrivaled depth of information, travel companies can fine-tune their hotel search functions with better filtering options, provide better recommendations and address customers with personalized offers that are tailored to their individual requirements. This ultimately allow travelers to make smarter booking and arrive well informed without anxiety and uncertainty. Learn more here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DsCclWG9NEE

Description: KeepPet is an innovative mobile app which allows pet owners to consult with vet professionals through online chats or video calls
Full Description: Keep your pet healthy with KeepPet: create a digital passport, chat with vets and join a global community of pet owners and veterinary professionals who share their passion of making this world a safe and happy place for our pets.  Main features: - Chats and video calls with the veterinarian - KeepPet Academy where vets publish a monthly digest with valuable information for pet owners - Pet profile with your pet’s pedigree and achievements KeepPet is an innovative mobile app which allows pet owners to consult with vet professionals through online chats or video calls.  The app boasts a global network of certified veterinarians that will ensure timely answers in a blink of an eye. Just search for a vet and start your consultation in a matter of seconds.  When we need to speak to someone about our own health, whether mental or physical, we want to be able to right away, now you can have that same quality service for your beloved pets. KeepPet is your first line of defense to help assess the urgency of your situation. To ensure the quality and relevance of the triage and following steps we will provide you with the nearest available vet. Subscribing your companion means to create a global and digital pet passport that can be shared within the KeepPet’s global veterinarian network and, therefore, become easily accessible in any moment of need from any location. You can keep your pet’s data in one place. No longer will you need to spend hours on the phone having records faxed from office to office. They’ll all be in one easy to access location, allowing the vet to better help right away. Explore your pet’s family tree, and highlight your pet’s achievements. KeepPet is not just an app or a service, it’s a global community of pet owners and veterinary professionals who share their passion of making this world a safe and happy place for our pets.  We share the latest news, scientific approach and innovation with our community. Not only will a vet’s advice be at your fingertips but you can also read about the latest and greatest in veterinary medicine.

Description: Revolutionizing the pathology workflow from biopsy to histopathological image
Full Description: SurgiVance Inc. is developing a confocal microscopy -based imager that produces rapid, high-resolution, digitally-colored images of biopsied tissue specimens. It is designed to supplant hematoxilin and eosin (H&E) staining – a labor-intensive, almost universal process considered the gold-standard for tissue preparation in advance of examination by a pathologist under a standard light-field microscope. Revolutionizing the workflow from biopsy to histopathological image will allow physicians to make faster clinical decisions, delivering significant time and cost savings for the clinic and an enhanced patient experience. SurgiVance’s images can integrate into electronic medical records and be instantly shared with other healthcare providers, including remote pathologists, or input into third-party diagnostic AIs. The SurgiVance product is engineered to be smaller, simpler, lower-cost, and more broadly useful than competing products. Our initial target market will be Mohs surgery practices, where skin cancers are excised in multiple stages.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Health Care

Description: Freeland Spirits is one of very few women owned and run distilleries in history.
Full Description: Welcome to Freeland Spirits, Portland’s new craft distillery. Freeland is named after my Meemaw (that’s what they call grandmas in Texas) Freeland, who never touched a drop of booze in her life but taught me that all good things come from scratch. And that women can be anything they want. Freeland Spirits celebrates the women of the craft. From the gals who grow the grain, to those who run the still, they’re creating superior spirits that celebrate all the Northwest has to offer. Freeland Spirits is one of very few women owned and run distilleries in history. Molly Troupe was born wearing a pair of chemist goggles and never took them off. Description: Health marketplace that gives you online access to your own, real life coach.
Full Description: Fitmo is a marketplace and platform that helps consumers find, and work with, real life coaches to help them reach their health goals. With our concept we differentiate ourselves from existing health apps and wearables by adding a personal connection and human-to-human interaction with a professional. We’re all about making this world fit and healthy. The problem with most existing health apps or wearable devices is that they are just that: apps and devices. There’s no human-to-human contact, while that has been shown as the most effective when it comes to reaching your health goals. For most people, a real personal trainer is also way too expensive ($25 up to $400/hour), Fitmo makes coaches affordable (from $8/month) and within reach of everyone. We connect you to a coach who fits you and your health goals. Your coach will push you to the limit and help you reach these goals. Coaches can monetize their free time and coach up to 50 people via the Fitmo platform. Text and video messaging, combined with interactive, updated training schedules and the possibility to import data from different wearables, makes it easy for coaches to keep up with their clients and help them in the right direction. Fitmo enables them to do their job at scale and to be more affordable to more people than traditional personal coaches. Fitmo is your own real and affordable personal coach in your pocket!

Description: D.Sole offers revolutionary at-home diagnostic wearable that can detect loss of sensation and ulcers caused by diabetes non-invasively!
Full Description: D-Sole is a novel non-invasive at-home medical device that aims at early diagnosis and prognostic evaluation of peripheral neuropathy in patients suffering from diabetes. Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathy (DPN) is a condition in which nerves in the peripheries are damaged and cause loss of sensation, diabetic ulcers, and gangrene. D.Sole is an insole worn by the patient that would monitor the loss of sensation on the plantar aspect of the patient's foot using our custom-made mobile application for feedback. Our innovative system has been designed to consider the patient's daily routine. For example, if the patient is out of range of their mobile phone, the insole will detect loss of sensation, avoiding false positives. D-Sole has been designed to incorporate various engineering solutions to solve a major medical problem.

Full Description: Divorce AI is divorce financial reporting - a new category of intelligent tools that combine divorce and wealth management. Powered by Artificial Intelligence, expert knowledge, and comprehensive reporting technology, Divorce AI is built by people who care about families going through a divorce. Divorce AI enables you to find what's important, understand why it's important, and put that information to use in the most powerful way possible. In short, we turn your future divorce into an easy-to-read report. The average divorce costs a whopping $20,000. That number can quickly grow if you are not properly prepared for a divorce. That is why every divorce starts here. We estimate all of your post-divorce expenses and incomes, asset separation options, future budget, net worth, and more. We are trying to save you time and money by better preparing you for a divorce. Divorce AI helps you understand the financial implications of your divorce and estimates your post-divorce financials, so you can better execute and negotiate the terms of your divorce. We'll admit it. We are not pretending to be your lawyer. Instead, we are empowering you with valuable information so you can take back control when hiring a lawyer. The value Divorce AI offers is an ability to quickly research, calculate and estimate future divorce outcomes without paying large lawyer fees. Guess what? You can even download all of your Divorce AI reports and show them to your friends, future lawyers, or save them for later use. Divorce AI's technology allows for extremely affordable prices compared to other options. All you have to do is sign-up, answer a few short questions, and sit back while we do the rest. We will provide you with an easy-to-read Divorce AI report.

In addition it is innovating new and intuitive ways to connect you with the world, while aggregating the majority of features and functionalities seen in other social media, chat, and currency transfer applications. Founded in Los Angeles, CA in 2017, Other Mind is designed to free users from the constant focus on digital devices, using the full capabilities of AI and machine learning to execute mundane tasks while keeping the user engaged. It is changing how people leverage technology and is giving users back time, freedom and independence from the struggle of maintaining an ever-growing digital presence, while staying completely connected.  Other Mind is an alternative technology company that is 100% subscription-based and does not rely on third party data monetization or other forms of advertising or data-mining tools. Description: We make every text in the world visible and audible with AI generation technology.
Full Description: AIPARK's SaaS solution AiVATAR creates digital human videos that speak multiple languages by simply inputting text. AiVATAR is a service that combines the following three technologies: - Text-To-Speech: AIPARK's proprietary artificial intelligence voice synthesis algorithm learns from datasets composed of text and audio and allows users to output speech by only entering text, based on the trained AI voice synthesis algorithm. AIPARK has developed its own algorithms and possesses multiple TTS solutions. The AI voices implemented using this technology are being utilized in JTBC morning broadcasts, industrial broadcasts, and audiobook companies. - Talking Head Generation: AIPARK's proprietary artificial intelligence video synthesis algorithm learns from tens of thousands of audio and facial data to output speaking videos regardless of the input voice. It has been trained on a large amount of data to naturally speak over 20 languages, including Korean, English, Japanese, and Chinese. - Face Generation: This technology synthesizes and combines different faces to create completely new faces, generating virtual characters. It uses actual human faces rather than graphics for synthesis and re-creation, resulting in less visual discrepancy and freedom from portrait rights issues. With the multilingual digital humans created by AiVATAR, users can experience unlimited applications such as news production, product promotion, and educational broadcasts.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Media and Entertainment, Science and Engineering, Software, Video

Description: AI driven platform for better hiring. We use neuroscience-based games and machine learning for staffing services.
Full Description: Genoma.work is an AI driven platform for better hiring. The platform transforms recruitment through gamification and data science improving efficiency and quality of hiring.  Using the best tools of neuroscience and behavioral sciences, we collect data and, through Artificial Intelligence algorithms, we carry out predictive analysis of job performance. Our AI-Powered algorithm identifies the critical factors from current top employees and looks for those variables in the candidates.  The model compares the fit between the applicants with the ideal profile generating a Fit Score. Additionally, the system looks for important data from applicant’s LinkedIn profiles and their CVs.  Finally, the platform incorporates video interviews letting candidates to introduce themselves. As a result, genoma.work increases the quality of hire reduces time to hire and enhances candidate experiences.

Description: Productable is an innovation management platform that sets organizations up with everything they need to innovate successfully.
Full Description: Headquartered in Austin, Texas, Productable is an innovation management platform that sets organizations up with everything they need to innovate successfully. Our all-in-one solution gives top-down leadership the reporting and insights they need to drive transformation quickly and gives bottom-up innovators the right process and right tools to scale their ideas into real solutions. Productable Founder & CEO Rachel Kuhr Conn launched the patent-pending SaaS platform in 2019 after almost a decade of testing innovation methodology. She first developed the Productable process as academic research with top institutions such as MIT then perfected it as head of innovation for Mark Cuban Companies and more than 20 other large corporations. Productable turned this process - widely known as Portfolio Innovation - into software and leverages it to help organizations of all sizes innovate successfully. Portfolio Innovation is all about creating an ecosystem that nurtures transformation, tackling innovation from the top, middle and bottom.

The company's single molecule localization microscopy is a combination of consumable, hardware and software techniques to achieve reliable state-of-the-art science, enabling companies conducting research in the fields of biology, pharmacology and environment to implement super-resolved fluorescence microscopy approaches to observe biological samples with better resolution. Abbelight ambitions to make these cutting-edge techniques accessible to all laboratories by simplifying their use, without sacrificing the performance of instruments. To accomplish this, they accompany scientists from the preparation of the samples to the treatment of the results by proposing chemistry, computer science and optical instruments.

Description: Dr. Smile Medical Group is a hospital and health care service provider.
Full Description: Dr. Smile Medical Group provides diagnosis and treatment of varicose veins, venous thrombosis, venous ulcers, and other venous diseases of the lower limbs. Dr. Smile Medical Group has a professional team of phlebology specialists and cutting-edge CHIVA minimally invasive varicose vein treatment technology, which has treated more than 20,000 cases of varicose veins at home and abroad, putting it at the forefront of the world. Through the study of venous hemodynamics and the application of CHIVA, Dr. Smile Medical Group successfully shortened the traditional inpatient treatment of varicose veins, which may take several days, into an outpatient treatment that takes only about an hour, minimizing the complications of traditional surgery and saving a lot of time and subsequent recovery process for patients.

Our tool allows anyone to turn their many hours of video material into jaw-dropping videos, trailers and promos. NOVA A.I. further alleviates creatives and marketeers from the manual, labor-intensive tasks of video editing and idea validation by streamlining post-production, allowing creatives to produce multiple videos in minutes.
